content: If you don’t have a job, or you are working but beneath where you should be able to be, and you are struggling to put food on table for your children, you do not care about climate change one way or the other. You simply have bigger issues to be concerned about than if we stop using coal or not. This is another way the radical left refuses to understand, some people are struggling to live today, concerns over what “may” happen 100 years from now are far from their thoughts.
